name: admin.functions.permissions.set
desc: Set the visibility of a Slack function and define the users or workspaces if it is set to named_entities.

function_id.desc: The function ID to set permissions for.

user_ids.desc: List of user IDs to allow for named_entities visibility.

errors.access_denied: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
errors.function_not_found: The referenced function does not exist.
errors.invalid_setting: The app_collaborators setting is not allowed for apps not owned by your team/org.
errors.restricted_action: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
